featured.text: The BBC once reported that Swiss farmers were experiencing a spaghetti crop and showed scenes of people harvesting noodles from trees.

definition.zh_def: 一種長條形的食物，通常由麵粉和水製成，經過煮熟後食用。
definition.en_def: A long, thin piece of food made from flour and water, typically cooked and eaten.
definition.example: I love to eat noodle soup on cold days.
